Articles.Content:
> 
> Perhaps that was landing effects?

yeah... maybe.
I cant keep up with twitch and the forums at the same time THE HYPE IS REAL WITH THIS ONE!!\
Hyoep{
Is it me or did the list of online members break?
The forum's getting screwy. Either that means they're about to go live, or they need to go live to avoid crashing their servers.
Come on boys!! I can practically smell the as of yet theoretical smell of page 500!!
Error 406 hype predictor frontend overload

> 
> can anyone explain what all this hype is about? I came looking for Star Wars Lego...

heres the legos \*points at coal oven\*
404- Not Hype error
This is an experience of blissful insanity.

Error 404 

reason:

To much hype!!!

> 
> 500, we are coming for you!

It's go fever, baby!

Hype factor 12.7!!

> 
> Is it me or did the list of online members break?

I broke.

Several times.
This train is putting all other hype trains to shame!
Why users online list is gone?

> 
> The forum's getting screwy. Either that means they're about to go live, or they need to go live to avoid crashing their servers.

Probably becuase of us!

> 
> can anyone explain what all this hype is about? I came looking for Star Wars Lego...

You came for the lego, but stayed for the hype!

***WORLD RECORD:***

6 pages in under 30 seconds
HYPE HYPE HYPE HYPE hype
1.0 in 10 minutes? Who knows? Hyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyype!
lol my last page button cant keep up this was written at 405 pages
This is the best Hype voyage ever!
feel the hype... BE THE HYPE

> 
> Why users online list is gone?

I just noticed a minute ago.

> 
> This is an experience of blissful insanity.

100% agree. Well, with the insanity part anyhow~
